page.topic: Suppress labels when in AbsoluteLayout container
page.description: If this control is inside an AbsoluteLayout container, should the labels for each Radiobutton control be suppressed? You might want to do this if you are using a bitmap background for the AbsoluteLayout container and the bitmap has labels on it.

section.note: This option is only shown if the choices for the Radiobutton are from a static list.
